types.GameEngine: fields: canvas HTMLCanvasElement, ctx CanvasRenderingContext2D, eventBus EventBus, targetFPS Number, timestep Number, systems Array, entityManager EntityManager
types.EventBus: fields: listeners Map for event callbacks
types.Entity: fields: id Number, active Boolean, components Set, componentData Map
types.Component: pure data structures processed by systems
types.System: behavior logic operating on entities with specific components
types.GameState: fields: currentWave Number, waveState String, enemiesRemaining Number, currentScore Number, killCount Number
types.EntityManager: fields: entities Map, nextEntityId Number, componentIndex Map, pendingDestruction Set
types.PerformanceMonitor: fields: frameCount Number, metrics Object, frameTimeHistory Array, historyIndex Number, thresholds Object, systemTimers Map, performanceAlerts Array
types.InputManager: fields: canvas HTMLCanvasElement, pressedKeys Set, mousePosition Vector2D, lastValidMousePosition Vector2D, eventListenerHealth Map, inputValidationEnabled Boolean
types.MovementComponent: fields: velocity Vector2D, targetVelocity Vector2D, maxSpeed Number, acceleration Number, deceleration Number, movementState String
types.RotationComponent: fields: rotation Number, targetRotation Number, rotationSpeed Number, smoothRotation Boolean, facingDirection Vector2D
types.ProjectileComponent: fields: velocity Vector2D, damage Number, maxDistance Number, distanceTraveled Number, sourceEntityId Number, projectileType String, creationTime Number, piercing Boolean
types.WeaponComponent: fields: fireRate Number, lastShotTime Number, projectileSpeed Number, projectileType String, automatic Boolean, muzzleOffset Vector2D, currentCooldown Number
types.ProjectilePool: fields: poolObjects Array, activeObjects Set, availableIndices Array, poolSize Number, maxPoolSize Number, expansionCount Number, emergencyMode Boolean
types.SpatialGrid: fields: worldBounds Object, cellSize Number, gridWidth Number, gridHeight Number, cells Map, entityCells Map
types.CollisionSystem: fields: eventBus EventBus, spatialGrid SpatialGrid, degradationLevel Number, fallbackStrategies Array, consecutiveFailures Number, maxFailures Number
types.CollisionLayers: fields: PLAYER String, PLAYER_PROJECTILE String, ENEMY String, ENEMY_PROJECTILE String, ENVIRONMENT String, collisionMatrix Map
types.BoundingBoxComponent: fields: width Number, height Number, offsetX Number, offsetY Number
types.DamageComponent: fields: baseDamage Number, damageType String, criticalChance Number, criticalMultiplier Number, armorPiercing Boolean
types.HealthComponent: fields: currentHealth Number, maxHealth Number, armorValue Number, resistance Map, vulnerability Map, invulnerabilityTimer Number, lastDamageSource Number, deathCallbacks Array
types.AIComponent: fields: currentState String, targetEntity Number, lastTargetPosition Vector2D, separationRadius Number, attackRange Number, sightRange Number, aggroTimer Number, behaviorWeights Object, stateTimer Number
types.EnemyComponent: fields: archetype String, scoreValue Number, spawnTime Number, waveModifier Number
types.SpatialNeighborFinder: fields: cellSize Number, grid Map, entityCells Map
types.ScoreSystem: fields: eventBus EventBus, highScoreManager HighScoreManager, currentSession Object, comboTracker ComboTracker
types.ComboTracker: fields: currentCombo Number, lastKillTime Number, comboTimeWindow Number
types.HighScoreManager: fields: categories Map, storageKeys Object, validationRules Object
types.ScoreComponent: fields: sessionScore Number, totalKills Number, accuracy Number, longestCombo Number
types.StatisticsComponent: fields: shotsHit Number, shotsFired Number, sessionStartTime Number, survivalTime Number
types.ErrorManager: fields: eventBus EventBus, performanceMonitor PerformanceMonitor, systemStates Map, errorHistory Array, recoveryStrategies Map, criticalErrorThreshold Number
types.SystemHealthMonitor: fields: systems Array, performanceMonitor PerformanceMonitor, healthMetrics Map, alertThresholds Map, healthCheckInterval Number
types.CollisionFallbacks: static class providing alternative collision algorithms
types.PoolMonitor: fields: pools Array, usageHistory Map, alertCallbacks Map, monitoringInterval Number
types.DegradationManager: fields: performanceMonitor PerformanceMonitor, systems Array, degradationRules Map, activeDegradations Set
types.GameTestRunner: fields: tests Map, currentSuite String, results Object, timeControl TestTimeControl
types.DebugRenderer: fields: canvas HTMLCanvasElement, ctx CanvasRenderingContext2D, enabled Boolean, layers Set, debugElements Map, options Object, styles Object
types.GameLogger: fields: logLevels Array, currentLevel String, logHistory Array, maxHistorySize Number, categoryFilters Set, enabledCategories Set
types.ModifierStack: fields: eventBus EventBus, modifiers Map, baseValues Map, cachedValues Map, recalculationQueue Set
types.PowerUpComponent: fields: powerUpType String, duration Number, stackable Boolean, maxStacks Number, currentStacks Number, effectMultiplier Number, activationTime Number, expirationCallbacks Array
types.PowerUpCollectibleComponent: fields: powerUpType String, spawnTime Number, magnetRange Number, collectSound String, collectEffect String, respawnDelay Number
types.ModifierStackComponent: fields: activeModifiers Map, baseValues Map, currentValues Map, recalculationNeeded Boolean
types.WeaponStatsComponent: fields: weaponType String, level Number, experience Number, upgradeTree Map, unlockedModes Set, activeMode String
types.AmmoComponent: fields: currentAmmo Number, maxAmmo Number, ammoType String, reloadTime Number, reloadStartTime Number, infiniteAmmo Boolean
types.FiringPatternComponent: fields: patternType String, projectileCount Number, spreadAngle Number, burstCount Number, burstDelay Number, patternData Map
types.BossComponent: fields: bossType String, currentPhase Number, phaseThresholds Array, phaseData Map, enrageTimer Number, vulnerabilityWindows Array
types.MultiHitboxComponent: fields: hitboxes Array, vulnerableHitboxes Set, hitboxDamageMultipliers Map, hitboxHealthPools Map
types.AttackPatternComponent: fields: availableAttacks Array, currentPattern String, patternProgress Number, cooldowns Map, telegraphTime Number
types.NetworkManager: fields: connectionState String, playerId String, serverEndpoint String, messageQueue Array, pingTracker PingTracker, syncTimer Number
types.NetworkComponent: fields: networkId String, authorityType String, lastSyncTime Number, interpolationBuffer Array, conflictResolution String
types.PredictionComponent: fields: predictedState Map, confirmedState Map, rollbackBuffer Array, predictionErrors Array, reconciliationNeeded Boolean
types.AssetManager: fields: loadedAssets Map, assetRegistry Map, loadingQueue Array, cachePolicy String, maxCacheSize Number, usageTracking Map
types.AssetComponent: fields: assetId String, loadState String, fallbackAsset String, preloadPriority Number, retryCount Number
types.TextureAtlas: fields: atlasImage HTMLImageElement, spriteDefinitions Map, atlasWidth Number, atlasHeight Number, spriteCache Map
types.ParticleSystem: fields: particlePool Array, emitters Array, globalForces Array, maxParticles Number, renderLayers Map, particleShaders Map
types.LightingComponent: fields: lightType String, intensity Number, color String, radius Number, castShadows Boolean, flickerPattern Array
types.RenderLayer: fields: layerId String, zIndex Number, renderTargets Array, blendMode String, postProcessEffects Array
types.BossAISystem: fields: eventBus EventBus, entityManager EntityManager, phaseManagers Map

methods.gameLoop(currentTime): main fixed timestep loop with interpolated rendering
methods.updateSystems(): processes all game logic for one timestep
methods.render(interpolationFactor): draws all visual elements with smooth interpolation
methods.normalize(): returns unit vector for direction calculations
methods.addComponent(componentType, data): attaches component to entity with optional data overrides
methods.hasComponent(componentType): checks if entity has specific component
methods.queryEntities(...componentTypes): returns entities matching all specified components
methods.updateWaveProgress(enemiesKilled, enemyT: updates wave state after enemy deaths
methods.getMouseWorldPosition(): returns current mouse position in world coordinates
methods.updateAiming(entity, mouseWorldPos): updates entity rotation to face mouse position
methods.calculateFacingAngle(fromPos, toPos): computes angle between points in radians
methods.deallocateProjectile(entity): returns projectile to pool and resets component data
methods.fromAngle(angle, magnitude): creates vector from angle and magnitude
methods.isOutsideScreenBounds(position): checks if position is outside visible area plus buffer
methods.attemptToFire(entity): handles weapon firing logic with cooldown validation
methods.calculateMuzzlePosition(entityPosition,: computes world position for projectile spawn
methods.getCellKey(x, y): converts world coordinates to grid cell identifier
methods.updateEntity(entity, position): updates entity position in spatial grid
methods.getCollisionCandidates(entity, position): returns Set of entities that could collide with given entity
methods.removeEntity(entity): removes entity from spatial grid on destruction
methods.checkAABBCollision(entity1, entity2): performs axis-aligned bounding box overlap test
methods.processCollisionResponse(collisionEvent): handles damage application and collision aftermath
methods.canCollide(layer1, layer2): checks if two collision layers can interact
methods.updateAI(enemy, deltaTime): processes AI state machine and behavior updates
methods.calculatePursuitForce(enemy): computes movement force toward target entity
methods.calculateSeparationForce(enemy): computes avoidance force from nearby enemies
methods.calculateWallAvoidanceForce(enemy): computes repulsion force from screen boundaries
methods.processDamage(targetId, sourceId, baseDa: applies damage with armor and resistance calculations
methods.triggerDeath(entity, killerId): handles entity death processing and cleanup
methods.getNeighborsInRadius(position, radius, e: returns nearby entities for separation behavior
methods.createEnemy(archetypeId, position, waveM: spawns new enemy with archetype configuration
methods.initializeSession() returns Object: creates new scoring session with default values
methods.handleWaveCompleted(eventData) returns v: calculates and applies wave completion bonuses
methods.registerKill(timestamp) returns Number: updates combo tracker and returns multiplier
methods.updateSystems() returns void: processes all game logic for one timestep
methods.processEvent(event) returns void: handles single event dispatch to subscribers
methods.gameLoop(currentTime) returns void: main fixed timestep loop with interpolated rendering
methods.processCollisions(entities, deltaTime): enhanced collision detection with degradation support
methods.basicAABBCollision(entities): distance-filtered AABB collision without spatial grid
methods.proximityBasedCollision(entities): simple circular collision for emergency fallback
methods.expandPool(additionalSize): increases pool capacity up to maximum limit
methods.updateMousePosition(event): validates and updates mouse coordinates with fallback
methods.handlePerformanceWarning(performanceData: triggers coordinated system degradation based on performance metrics
methods.describe(suiteName, testFunction): creates test suite with organized test functions
methods.test(testName, testFunction): executes individual test with error handling
methods.createControlledGame(systems): creates game instance with controlled timing for testing
methods.advance(milliseconds): moves controlled time forward by specified amount
methods.setFrameRate(fps): configures time control for specific frame rate
methods.createTestPlayer(x, y): generates pre-configured player entity for testing
methods.createTestEnemy(x, y, archetype): generates enemy entity with specified type
methods.createCombatScenario(playerPos, enemyPos: sets up multi-entity combat test scenario
methods.toggleLayer(layerName): enables or disables debug layer visibility
methods.render(): draws all active debug overlays on canvas
methods.addCollisionBox(entityId, x, y, width, h: registers collision box for debug rendering
methods.addAITarget(entityId, fromX, fromY, toX,: registers AI target line for debug rendering
methods.shouldDegradePerformance(): checks if performance degradation should trigger
methods.logAITransition(entityId, fromState, toS: logs AI state transition with context
methods.logPerformanceWarning(system, frameTime,: logs performance warning with system context
methods.registerBaseValue(entityId, property, va: registers base property value before modifier application
methods.addModifier(entityId, property, modifier: adds property modifier and returns removal ID
methods.getValue(entityId, property) returns Num: gets calculated property value with modifiers applied
methods.recalculateEntity(entityId): recalculates all modified properties for entity
methods.initializeBoss(bossEntity, bossConfig): sets up boss with multi-phase behavior
methods.checkPhaseTransition(bossEntity): evaluates health thresholds for phase changes
methods.connect(serverUrl): establishes WebSocket connection to game server
methods.send(messageType, data): sends message to server with queuing support

constants.componentFactory: global instance for creating component data

terms.fixed timestep: constant rate game logic independent of rendering
terms.spatial partitioning: dividing world into regions for optimization
terms.multi-collision resolution: handling multiple simultaneous collisions affecting same entity
terms.pool exhaustion: object pool running out of instances
terms.state machine corruption: AI entering invalid states due to race conditions
terms.collision fallback: alternative collision algorithms when primary system fails
terms.recovery state machine: standardized error recovery with defined states and transitions
terms.input fault tolerance: maintaining responsive controls despite input system errors
terms.error recovery loops: systems attempting to fix themselves after failure
terms.emergent behavior: complex behaviors arising from simple rule interactions
terms.visual debugging overlays: debug information rendered directly in game world
terms.discrete collision detection: checking positions only at frame boundaries
terms.swept collision detection: testing entire movement path between frames
terms.configurable projectile factories: weapons as systems that create projectiles with specific behaviors
terms.mini-games within the game: boss encounters with unique rule sets and mechanics
terms.converting a single orchestra into a syn: mental model for multiplayer coordination challenges
terms.just-in-time library system: asset loading approach that loads resources when needed
terms.upgrading from watercolors to a full art: mental model for advanced rendering capabilities
terms.progressive enhancement strategy: incremental extension approach building on existing architecture
terms.state synchronization bugs: multiplayer issues where client and server states diverge
